_comment0: Adds different versions of an item to the creative menu
_comment1: A specific tab may be specified as the 'group' (see below)
_comment2: The same item can be registered multiple times with different abilities
_comment3: Order in which the items are added to the creative tab. Cannot be used to place items before built-in ones.
_comment4: The wing must be registered separately, and can have its own abilities/tags
_comment5: Creative tabs are identified by their translation keys. The default ones are:
_comment8: Where the item should appear. Possible values: ['parent_and_search_tabs', 'parent_tab_only', 'search_tab_only']
_comment10: Aerobatic Elytra abilities for the item
_comment11: Optional NBT tag for the item, in JSON NBT format. Can be used to set color/banner patterns and trail.
